title: Rangpur Fog-Line Layers
description: Char dwellers along the Teesta are bracing for back-to-back fog alerts; every bundle of quilts and thermal sets keeps a bari warm.

title: Rajshahi Padma Night Guard
description: Boat schools anchoring on the Padma riverbanks need hoodies, baby wraps, and floor blankets for families displaced by erosion.

title: Dhaka Canopy Kids
description: Street-connected children in Mirpur and Mohammadpur require clean blankets, glove pairs, and ear warmers before midnight temperatures drop.

title: Chattogram Hill Thermals
description: Marma and Chakma villages near Khagrachari are asking for breathable thermals, socks, and rainproof shawls for high-elevation nights.

title: Sylhet Tea Garden Shield
description: Tea pluckers working sunrise shifts in damp leaf tunnels rely on gumboots, lined raincoats, and hand warmers to avoid chills.

title: Khulna Sundarbans Shawls
description: Fisher families docking on the Rupsha rely on heavy shawls, waterproof mittens, and fleece beanies to survive salt-laden winds.

title: Barishal Delta Blanket Boats
description: Floating relief boats ferry moisture-wicking blankets, hot water bags, and thermal scarves to Meghna sandbar households.

title: Mymensingh Quilt Co-op
description: University volunteers stitch recycled quilts and fleece vests for Trishal char villages facing relentless cold snaps.

title: Bogura Highway Thermal Stop
description: Night canteens on the Bogura highway hand out soup along with socks, ear muffs, and windproof jackets to drivers on duty.

title: Jessore Border Glow
description: Migrant families crossing Benapole require ready-to-wear shawls, baby caps, and insulated leggings while waiting overnight.

title: Cumilla Transit Warmth
description: Bus terminals distribute travel blankets, mufflers, and thermal leggings to commuters stranded overnight by fog delays.

title: Cox's Bazar Salt Spray Layers
description: Cyclone shelters near Inani beach need quick-dry ponchos, fleece blankets, and insulated baby suits for displaced families.
